Hey guyz and galz I appreciate everybody keeping an eye out for my gear. I have added a list of the articles inside the trailer and some identifying marks that would help identify my trailer from others.  The trailer was taken from the OLCO gas station on Hwy10 just south of King St north of Brampton, Ontario. The theft occurred on Thursday June14th sometime between 3pm and 5pm. The only description I have, is from the moron running the gas station who generously handed over my entire ice fishing existence, no questions asked. It's a fat white guy around 300 pounds. Well that narrows it down. I'm just hoping at this point somebody traveling in the area seen the trailer perhaps on a side road somewhere or perhaps the type and color of truck towing it.  The identifying features I mentioned on the trailer are a small 6 inch ding on the side of the trailer where somebody backed into it. There is also some pitting of the aluminum panels at the bottom along both sides. The front fold down door was reskined last year and the sheet doesn't quite fit the door as it was a just a tad short. The back door was also reskined last fall and they were unable to place the rear lights back onto the rear fold down door. They ended up placing a couple of LED light bars (about 12inches long) on the side pieces on either side of the back fold down door. They also repositioned the license plate from the back fold down door to up along the top of the trailer at the back above the door. The inside of the trailer has been painted grey on the floor and part way up the side walls and there is a runner strip up one side of the back door only. There is an auger mount up at the front and helmet cabinets along the one side. There is also a spare tire up at the front and space for two gas cans. One of the gas cans has a S on the side and the other has an R.  The list of items that were inside is as follows:  1. 1999 Ski Doo Grand Touring 700 triple, blue in color, VIN#GT700137300183 2. 1999 Arctic Cat 440 Jag, Black in color, VIN#9905413 3. 1997 Arctic Cat 340 Puma, black and purple in color, VIN# 9733299 4. 1995 Ski Doo 380 Formula long track, Red in color, VIN# 15200184 5. 2 Fish Trap Yukon's w/ runners,covers and hitches 6. 1 Fish Trap Guide w/ runners, custom cover and hitch 7. Jiffy model 30, 3hp, 8 inch auger 8. 2 Mr. Heater Heater Buddy heaters with custom made blue cases that house the heater and canisters of propane 9. snowmobile dolly 10. 4 trays of assorted tackle. 1 box of Williams type spoons, 1 box of swimming baits (jigging raps, nils master, etc) 1 box of heavy spoons (buckshot rattle, Hopkins, Mr. Champ etc) 1 box of jigging minnows (meegs, bad boyz and humpback creepers)   Just a heads up to any and all out there. Please be advised that my 26ft enclosed trailer and all it's contents have been stolen. The police are looking into it but I would appreciate if you guyz and gals could please keep your eyes open and call the OPP if you spot it.  The trailer is a 2001 Continental Snow King white in color and is lettered with (ICEGUYZ.COM Everything for and about Icefishing.) in blue lettering on both sides. The plate on it was A23 18K.  It is a V nose drive in, drive out. VIN # 4X4TSED241N018628   There is a reward, if you have any information that leads to the return of my property. Thanks Don 905-609-4899 [emailÂ protected]
Too bad about the trailer Don. I'll keep my eyes open in my travels.
WOW Don that sucks major dude. dude,s. Is there any markings that would stand out on the trailer,beside the lettering,which Im sure will be off? Hope ya find it bud.
